## MessageDetails.ForgotPasswordToken type

Details type for a forgot-password token-based message

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ForgotPasswordToken = {
        USER_NAME: string;
        RESET_TOKEN: string;
        NEW_PASSWORD: string;
    };
```
